data.quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
data.author: Leia Organa

data.quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
data.author: Darth Vader

data.quote: It’s the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs. I’ve outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I’m talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She’s fast enough for you, old man.
data.author: Han Solo

data.quote: The Force will be with you. Always.
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

data.quote: Why, you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder!
data.author: Leia Organa

data.quote: Never tell me the odds!
data.author: Han Solo

data.quote: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: No. I am your father.
data.author: Darth Vader

data.quote: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
data.author: Luke Skywalker

data.quote: Now, young Skywalker, you will die.
data.author: Emperor Palpatine

data.quote: Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.
data.author: Anakin Skywalker

data.quote: There’s always a bigger fish.
data.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

data.quote: In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view.
data.author: Nute Gunray

data.quote: You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting.
data.author: Shmi Skywalker

data.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there?
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

data.quote: We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it
data.author: Queen Jamillia

data.quote: I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
data.author: Jango Fett

data.quote: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
data.author: Count Dooku

data.quote: The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
data.author: Chancellor Palpatine

data.quote: Power! Unlimited power!
data.author: Darth Sidious

data.quote: So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause.
data.author: Padmé Amidala

data.quote: You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you.
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

data.quote: To die for one’s people is a great sacrifice. To live for one’s people, an even greater sacrifice. I choose to live for my people.
data.author: Riyo Chuchi

data.quote: You are the Chosen One. You have brought balance to this world. Stay on this path, and you will do it again for the galaxy. But beware your heart.
data.author: The Father

data.quote: Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will.
data.author: Duchess Satine Kryze

data.quote: The Sith killed each other, victims of their own greed. But from the ashes of their destruction, I was the last survivor. I chose to pass my knowledge on to only one. I created a legacy so resilient that now you come before me.
data.author: Darth Bane

data.quote: The Sith took everything from me. Ripped me from my mother’s arms, murdered my brother, used me as a weapon, and then cast me aside. Abandoned me. Once, I had power — now I have nothing.
data.author: Maul

data.quote: I am no Jedi.
data.author: Ahsoka Tano

data.quote: An object cannot make you good or evil. The temptation of power, forbidden knowledge, even the desire to do good can lead some down that path. But only you can change yourself.
data.author: Bendu

data.quote: If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
data.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

data.quote: The garbage’ll do!
data.author: Rey

data.quote: Chewie, we’re home.
data.author: Han Solo

data.quote: You know, no matter how much we fought, I’ve always hated watching you leave.
data.author: Leia Organa

data.quote: Oh, my dear friend. How I’ve missed you.
data.author: C-3PO

data.quote: I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me.
data.author: Chirrut Îmwe

data.quote: Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost.
data.author: Cassian Andor

data.quote: Jyn, I’ll be there for you. Cassian said I had to.
data.author: K-2SO

data.quote: Hope.
data.author: Leia Organa
